SYN_3_4_8059:
Procedure: Rigid Bronch/Attempted Dilation
Complication: Airway Perforation/Pneumo
Steps:
1. GA. Flex scope showed complete LMS blockage.
2. Switched to Rigid. Used knife, balloon, APC to try to open it.
3. Saw pulmonary artery through a hole in the airway. Stopped immediately.
4. Put fibrin glue in.
5. Patient got a pneumothorax -> put in pigtail chest tube.
6. Sent to ICU intubated.
Plan: CT Surgery consult.
